en.click_to_zoom:
Click to zoom in
Press shift and click to zoom out
en.index_title: Welcome to the free online collaborative whiteboard!
en.introduction_paragraph: This is an open-source online collaborative whiteboard that allows many users to draw simultaneously on a large virtual board. The board is updated in real time for all connected users, and its state is always persisted. It can be used for many different purposes, including art, entertainment, design and teaching.
en.private_board_description: You can create a private board with a random name, that will be accessible only by its link.
en.share_instructions: To collaborate on a drawing in real time with someone, just send them its URL.
